name: Balloon Hunt (VR)
description:
Virual Reality Game requiring a VR headset - only tested on Meta 'Oculus' Quest 2
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Pop Those Balloons And Dont Get Caught.

Controls are continuous movement and turning using the joysticks.
Hit the balloons with you hands (or run into them) to pop them.

Check your watches for helpful information.

Clowns freeze when their balloon is popped.

Choose between easy, medium and a hard difficulty.

Can you get on the leaderboards?
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Any and all feedback appreciated
